creditline: The Katherine Kittredge McMillan Memorial Fund
description: hexagonal box with hinged cover and enameled in multicolors; cover painted with miniature portrait of Shah Jehan, his head against a yellow solar disc and holding a rose in left hand; above his head are 2 confronted doves and around him in multicolors are open, exotic foliage; the sides of box are similarly enameled with flowers in full bloom; on the frontal facet is a multicolor bird with its head turned backward and the back facet, below the hinge, is a singing bird among flowers; the bottom is painted with feathered green and in the center with an open flower seen from a bird's eye view
title: Presentation Box with portrait of Shah Kehan
